verses.verse: פַּלְגֵי־ <WH6388> [as] the rivers מַ֣יִם <WH4325> of water לֶב־ <WH3820> heart מֶ֭לֶךְ <WH4428> The king's בְּיַד־ <WH3027> [is] in the hand יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַֽל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he יַחְפֹּ֣ץ <WH2654> it whithersoever he will יַטֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH5186> he turneth כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all manner דֶּרֶךְ־ <WH1870> along
אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> of a man יָשָׁ֣ר <WH3477> [is] right בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in his own eyes וְתֹכֵ֖ן <WH8505> pondereth לִבּ֣וֹת <WH3826> the hearts יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> but the LORD
עֲ֭שֹׂה <WH6213> To do צְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> justice וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> and judgment נִבְחָ֖ר <WH977> [is] more acceptable לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to the LORD מִזָּֽבַח׃ <WH2077> than sacrifice
רוּם־ <WH7311> bring up עֵ֭ינַיִם <WH5869> look וּרְחַב־ <WH7342> and a proud לֵ֑ב <WH3820> heart נִ֖ר <WH5215> [and] the plowing רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked חַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> [is] sin

מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> The thoughts חָ֭רוּץ <WH2742> of the diligent אַךְ־ <WH389> surely לְמוֹתָ֑ר <WH4195> [tend] only to plenteousness וְכָל־ <WH3605> everyone אָ֝֗ץ <WH213> but of every one [that is] hasty אַךְ־ <WH389> surely לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃ <WH4270> only to want

פֹּ֣עַל <WH6467> The getting א֭וֹצָרוֹת <WH214> of treasures בִּלְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> tongue שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> by a lying הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> [is] a vanity נִ֝דָּ֗ף <WH5086> tossed to and fro of מְבַקְשֵׁי־ <WH1245> them that seek מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> death

שֹׁד־ <WH7701> The robbery רְשָׁעִ֥ים <WH7563> of the wicked יְגוֹרֵ֑ם <WH1641> shall destroy כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because מֵ֝אֲנ֗וּ <WH3985> them because they refuse לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment

הֲפַכְפַּ֬ךְ <WH2019> [is] froward דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of man וָזָ֑ר <WH2054> and strange וְ֝זַ֗ךְ <WH2134> but [as for] the pure יָשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> [is] right פָּעֳלֽוֹ׃ <WH6467> his work

ט֗וֹב <WH2896> [It is] better לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> to dwell עַל־ <WH5921> in פִּנַּת־ <WH6438> in a corner גָּ֑ג <WH1406> of the housetop מֵאֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> woman מִ֝דְיָנִ֗ים <WH4079> brawling וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house חָֽבֶר׃ <WH2267> in a wide

נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> The soul רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> of the wicked אִוְּתָה־ <WH183> desireth רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil לֹא־ <WH3808> no יֻחַ֖ן <WH2603> findeth no favour בְּעֵינָ֣יו <WH5869> in his eyes רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> his neighbour

בַּעְנָשׁ־ <WH6064> is punished לֵ֭ץ <WH3887> When the scorner יֶחְכַּם־ <WH2449> is made wise פֶּ֑תִי <WH6612> the simple וּבְהַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH7919> is instructed לְ֝חָכָ֗ם <WH2450> and when the wise יִקַּח־ <WH3947> he receiveth דָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> knowledge

מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <WH7919> [man] wisely considereth צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> The righteous לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> the house רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> of the wicked מְסַלֵּ֖ף <WH5557> [but God] overthroweth רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> the wicked לָרָֽע׃ <WH7451> for [their] wickedness

אֹטֵ֣ם <WH331> Whoso stoppeth אָ֭זְנוֹ <WH241> his ears מִזַּעֲקַת־ <WH2201> at the cry דָּ֑ל <WH1800> of the poor גַּֽם־ <WH1571> will also ה֥וּא <WH1931> himself יִ֝קְרָ֗א <WH7121> he also shall cry וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵעָנֶֽה׃ <WH6030> himself but shall not be heard

מַתָּ֣ן <WH4976> A gift בַּ֭סֵּתֶר <WH5643> in secret יִכְפֶּה־ <WH3711> pacifieth אָ֑ף <WH639> anger וְשֹׁ֥חַד <WH7810> and a reward בַּ֝חֵ֗ק <WH2436> in the bosom חֵמָ֥ה <WH2534> wrath עַזָּֽה׃ <WH5794> strong

שִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> [It is] joy לַ֭צַּדִּיק <WH6662> to the just עֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> judgment וּ֝מְחִתָּ֗ה <WH4288> but destruction לְפֹ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> [shall be] to the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> of iniquity

אָדָ֗ם <WH120> The man תּ֭וֹעֶה <WH8582> that wandereth מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way הַשְׂכֵּ֑ל <WH7919> of understanding בִּקְהַ֖ל <WH6951> in the congregation רְפָאִ֣ים <WH7496> of the dead יָנֽוּחַ׃ <WH5117> shall remain

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man מַ֭חְסוֹר <WH4270> [shall be] a poor אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> He that loveth שִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> pleasure אֹהֵ֥ב <WH157> he that loveth יַֽיִן־ <WH3196> wine וָ֝שֶׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> and oil לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יַעֲשִֽׁיר׃ <WH6238> shall not be rich

כֹּ֣פֶר <WH3724> [shall be] a ransom לַצַּדִּ֣יק <WH6662> for the righteous רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> The wicked וְתַ֖חַת <WH8478> the place יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> for the upright בּוֹגֵֽד׃ <WH898> and the transgressor

ט֗וֹב <WH2896> [It is] better שֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> to dwell בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> land מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> A desert מֵאֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> woman [מְדֹונִים כ] (מִדְיָנִ֣ים <WH4066> brawling ק) וָכָֽעַס׃ <WH3708> and an angry

אוֹצָ֤ר ׀ <WH214> [There is] treasure נֶחְמָ֣ד <WH2530> to be desired וָ֭שֶׁמֶן <WH8081> and oil בִּנְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> in the dwelling חָכָ֑ם <WH2450> of the wise וּכְסִ֖יל <WH3684> but a foolish אָדָ֣ם <WH120> man יְבַלְּעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH1104> spendeth it up

רֹ֭דֵף <WH7291> He that followeth צְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> after righteousness וָחָ֑סֶד <WH2617> and mercy יִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> findeth חַ֝יִּ֗ים <WH2416> life צְדָקָ֥ה <WH6666> righteousness וְכָבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> and honour

עִ֣יר <WH5892> the city גִּ֭בֹּרִים <WH1368> of the mighty עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> [man] scaleth חָכָ֑ם <WH2450> A wise וַ֝יֹּ֗רֶד <WH3381> and casteth down עֹ֣ז <WH5797> the strength מִבְטֶחָֽה׃ <WH4009> of the confidence
שֹׁמֵ֣ר <WH8104> Whoso keepeth פִּ֭יו <WH6310> his mouth וּלְשׁוֹנ֑וֹ <WH3956> and his tongue שֹׁמֵ֖ר <WH8104> keepeth מִצָּר֣וֹת <WH6869> from troubles נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> his soul
זֵ֣ד <WH2086> Proud יָ֭הִיר <WH3093> [and] haughty לֵ֣ץ <WH3887> scorner שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> [is] his name ע֝וֹשֶׂ֗ה <WH6213> who dealeth בְּעֶבְרַ֥ת <WH5678> wrath זָדֽוֹן׃ <WH2087> in proud

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <WH8378> The desire עָצֵ֣ל <WH6102> of the slothful תְּמִיתֶ֑נּוּ <WH4191> killeth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מֵאֲנ֖וּ <WH3985> refuse יָדָ֣יו <WH3027> him for his hands לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to labour

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> all the day הִתְאַוָּ֣ה <WH183> He coveteth תַאֲוָ֑ה <WH8378> greedily וְצַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> long but the righteous יִ֝תֵּ֗ן <WH5414> giveth וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יַחְשֹֽׂךְ׃ <WH2820> and spareth

זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> The sacrifice רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> of the wicked תּוֹעֵבָ֑ה <WH8441> [is] abomination אַ֝֗ף <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when בְזִמָּ֥ה <WH2154> evil יְבִיאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH935> how much more [when] he bringeth
עֵד־ <WH5707> witness כְּזָבִ֥ים <WH3577> A false יֹאבֵ֑ד <WH6> shall perish וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> but the man שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗עַ <WH8085> that heareth לָנֶ֥צַח <WH5331> constantly יְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> speaketh

הֵעֵ֬ז <WH5810> hardeneth אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> A wicked בְּפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> his face וְ֝יָשָׁ֗ר <WH3477> but [as for] the upright ה֤וּא ׀ <WH1931> he [יָכִין כ] (יָבִ֬ין <WH3559> certain ק) [דְּרָכָיו כ] (דַּרְכֹּֽו׃ <WH1870> along ק)

אֵ֣ין <WH369> There חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> [There is] no wisdom וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is no תְּבוּנָ֑ה <WH8394> nor understanding וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no עֵ֝צָ֗ה <WH6098> nor counsel לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God פ
ס֗וּס <WH5483> The horse מ֭וּכָן <WH3559> [is] prepared לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> against the day מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> of battle וְ֝לַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [is] of the LORD הַתְּשׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH8668> but safety
